DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effect darapladib cardiac conduction heart compare placebo moxifloxacin . This four period crossover design period last 10 day . There 7 10 day wash period .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of The Effects Of SB 480848 ( Darapladib ) On The Electrical Conduction Of The Heart
